com.netflix.genie.web.configs

Class TaskConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.web.configs.TaskConfig

  • @Configuration
public class TaskConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration of beans for asynchronous tasks within Genie.
    Since:
    3.0.0

      org.springframework.context.event.ApplicationEventMulticaster applicationEventMulticaster(org.springframework.core.task.TaskExecutor taskExecutor)
      A multicast (async) event publisher to replace the synchronous one used by Spring via the ApplicationContext.
      LeadershipTasksCoordinator leadershipTasksCoordinator(org.springframework.scheduling.TaskScheduler taskScheduler, java.util.Collection<LeadershipTask> tasks)
      Create the LeadershipTasksCoordination bean used to start and stop all leadership related tasks based on whether leadership is granted or revoked.
      LocalLeader localLeader(org.springframework.context.ApplicationEventPublisher publisher, boolean isLeader)
      If Spring Cloud Leadership is disabled and this node is forced to be the leader create the local leader bean which will fire appropriate events.

      • applicationEventMulticaster

        @Bean
public org.springframework.context.event.ApplicationEventMulticaster applicationEventMulticaster(org.springframework.core.task.TaskExecutor taskExecutor)
        A multicast (async) event publisher to replace the synchronous one used by Spring via the ApplicationContext.

      • taskScheduler

        @Bean
public org.springframework.scheduling.TaskScheduler taskScheduler(@Value(value="${genie.tasks.scheduler.pool.size:1}")
                                                                        int poolSize)
        Get a task scheduler.
        Parameters:
        poolSize - The initial size of the thread pool that should be allocated
        Returns:
        The task scheduler

      • taskExecutor

        @Bean
public org.springframework.core.task.AsyncTaskExecutor taskExecutor(@Value(value="${genie.tasks.executor.pool.size:1}")
                                                                          int poolSize)
        Get a task executor for executing tasks asynchronously that don't need to be scheduled at a recurring rate.
        Parameters:
        poolSize - The number of threads desired for this system. Likely best to do one more than number of CPUs
        Returns:
        The task executor the system to use

      • leadershipTasksCoordinator

        @Bean
 @ConditionalOnBean(value=LeadershipTask.class)
public LeadershipTasksCoordinator leadershipTasksCoordinator(org.springframework.scheduling.TaskScheduler taskScheduler,
                                                                                                                   java.util.Collection<LeadershipTask> tasks)
        Create the LeadershipTasksCoordination bean used to start and stop all leadership related tasks based on whether leadership is granted or revoked.
        Parameters:
        taskScheduler - The task scheduler to use for scheduling leadership tasks
        tasks - The leadership tasks to schedule
        Returns:
        The leader coordinator

      • localLeader

        @Bean
 @ConditionalOnProperty(value="spring.cloud.cluster.leader.enabled",
                       havingValue="false")
public LocalLeader localLeader(org.springframework.context.ApplicationEventPublisher publisher,
                                                                                                                                                      @Value(value="${genie.leader.enabled}")
                                                                                                                                                      boolean isLeader)
        If Spring Cloud Leadership is disabled and this node is forced to be the leader create the local leader bean which will fire appropriate events.
        Parameters:
        publisher - The application event publisher to use
        isLeader - Whether this node is the leader of the cluster or not
        Returns:
        The local leader bean
